translation.en: You know back when you first moved in?
translation.zh: 你第一次搬进来的时候？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 怎样？

translation.en: -Did you touch my drum set? -No, I didn't.
translation.zh:
-你有没有碰我的鼓？
-我才没有

translation.en: No, really, I won't get mad. I just wanna know.
translation.zh:
说真的，我不会生气
我只想知道

translation.en: No, I know. You said you wouldn't get mad.
translation.zh:
我知道
你说你不会生气

translation.en: I'm saying I didn't do it. I didn't do it, I never did it.
translation.zh:
我说我没碰
我真的没碰，从来没碰过

translation.en: -Then I owe you an apology. -No.
translation.zh:
-那我应该向你道歉
-不

translation.en: No, you don't, at all. No.
translation.zh: 你不用道歉，没关系

translation.en: Why wouldn't you take an apology if you didn't do it?
translation.zh:
你若没碰的话
为什么不接受道歉？

translation.en: Just because I'm cool. It doesn't matter.
translation.zh:
因为我人很上道
我无所谓

translation.en: You got my passport.
translation.zh: 你帮我拿了护照

translation.en: I'm good.
translation.zh: 有啦

translation.en: Don't worry, not gonna be late. Don't worry.
translation.zh:
别担心，不会赶不上的
别担心
